review: Didn't realize that you can't search the web to watch free web shows.  Really would like to see an outdoor channel (like Carbon TV) since this is what my husband likes to watch.  If the reviews comparing Fire TV and Chromecast would've made it clear about the web shows not being available - I would've bought the Chromecast

review: One major complaint...We are unable to watch anything on CBS unless I connect my Kindle to the TV.

review: I am completely useless when it comes to technical stuff.  Truly.The setup for the Fire TV stick was clear and so easy I couldn't believe it.  I have not explored all of the opportunities that are available to watch, but have enjoyed Prime video - movies and TV shows.This is excellent, I couldn't give a better review.
author: Deborah Way
